nodes.text: Nikki Vul was a female Human who worked as a HoloNet news reporter near the end of the Clone Wars.

Vul reported on the Battle of Coruscant in a HoloNet item broadcast across the galaxy, in which she revealed the outcome of the battle and praised its heroes, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker. Aayla Secura learned of developments on Coruscant through Vul's report.
